skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit will also ignore 50% of the target’s RES if Oella is on the same team. 

If the target is under an [Increase DEF] buff, each hit has a 80% chance of removing it. This effect cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Under the Skin
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Removes all debuffs from this Champion. Heals this Champion by 20% of their MAX HP for each debuff removed. 

Then, places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is equal to any surplus heal from this skill. 

Finally, attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore [Shield] buffs. Damage increases by 20% for each debuff removed by this skill.
skills.name: Resurging Reversal
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 100% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. Will ignore 50% of the target’s RES if Oella is on the same team. 

Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% whenever a [Sleep] debuff placed by this skill expires.
skills.name: Somnolence Spores
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Has a 15% chance of decreasing the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills by 1 turn every time they are healed by a [Continuous Heal] buff. The chance increases to 30% if Oella is on the same team.
skills.name: Metabolism [P]
